phrases: It is a statement from the group responsible for the attacks.
They are demanding public recognition of contractors,
as well as greater authority and rights as contractors.
Is this really what they said?
However, there is no denying that acts of terrorism have been committed
and that a group called the Evening Primrose exists.
Is BK201 related to them in any way?
Kirihara, what I am about to tell you is strictly confidential.
The leader of this terrorist group is a former MI6 conspirator known as February, Messier Code UB001.
Five years ago, she was in the front lines at Heaven's Gate.
It did not look like he went out to see an ex-girlfriend.
Did he look like a man who wanted revenge?
Officials were concerned that he still had feelings for her,
but it seems they were worried about nothing.
I guess we should observe him a little longer.
It is best you do not know for your own sake.
I guess it cannot be helped.
I will give you a hint.
Hei was betrayed by that woman,
and the rest of his team died in South America.
The first star ever recorded at that time was hers.
A myriad of stars began to shine as if they were reacting to her.
Included in that group was BK201.
Immediately following that incident, a 1,500 kilometer radius of South America disappeared from the face of the Earth.
There is no hope for any of you if you start drinking during the day.
is what the gusto of life is all about!
It is good to know that you have your priorities in order, Li-san.
Why do not you join us?
Do not drag an honest young man like him into your worthless lifestyle!
You cannot leave until the bill has been taken care of.
I told you that I forgot my wallet!
I will bring it tomorrow, okay?
I am Sakurai of the Nakazawa family.
Pay your bill and get the fuck out.
You are asking for trouble if you start pissing me off.
Let your fists do the talking.
Are you making fun of me?
I am going to kill you.
Do you really want to die?
You are making quite a scene, sir.
Sakurai Kenji-san of the Nakazawa family, right?
You are Chinese, as I thought!
Was not that Chinese martial arts?
You were dodging the enemy as easily as a butterfly.
I bet you could have taken care of him even if Aniki did not come, Li-san.
No, I do not think so.
Come on, you do not have to be so modest.
Kenji, a gangster who is been underestimated is not much of a gangster.
Thanks for looking out for him, man.
Well, it is part of the job.
Take this and treat him to a decent meal.
Are you sure you are okay with this?
You sure do eat a lot, do not you?
Could this be the secret behind your strength?
Like I said, it is not.
Stop being such a tease and tell me.
Are you really sure you were okay with beef bowls?
Since I have some money on me, I can take you to gentlemen's clubs if you are interested.
No, I will have to decline.
Distancing yourself from women is the secret behind your power.
I will make sure we reach your house.
I caused a lot of trouble for you today, so I insist.
You do not have much, do you?
Well, all I do is sleep when I come back.
Li-san, what do you do with your spare time whenever you are not working?
Did not you come to Japan to train?
That noise just shook the entire room, you know.
It is probably the same people from last night.
Can you even focus on studying with this noise?
It is not a big deal once you get used to it.
You are practically at their mercy!
Let me resolve this issue permanently.
What do you mean, what is it?
What the hell were you thinking, playing a guitar that loudly in a shoddy room with paper-thin walls?
What the hell were you thinking?
What are you going to do about that?
I bet you are all hungry from causing this ruckus.
Are you working in Japan by yourself?
My parents and siblings are still over there, so I send them money every month.
The Japanese are all rich perverts.
Why are you in Japan, rock star?
I am a missionary who came here to preach about the essence of rock.
That is pretty far out, man.
I came from Israel to study Japanese animation.
You came all the way here just for that?
Japanese anime is the best in the world.
Your explanations are always too long, so let me stop you right there.
This is a pretty diverse apartment, is not it?
I am fluent in seven different languages because of these tenants.
Wow, this place sure is interesting.
Maybe I should live here, too.
You have got to be kidding.
You just ate tons of beef bowls...
Let us start the second round!
Sorry, but I have an appointment to keep.
We barely talked to him until today.
Some people do not like to interact with others.
Do not you think there is a lonely aura emanating from Li-san's back?
Episode Seventeen A Love Song Sung from a Trash Heap... (Part One)
Hitotsubashi, it is not that I dislike a man like yourself.
However, I will not tolerate internal feuds.
I know you have been taking Ohshita's territory.
I have no intention of inciting this conflict any further.
Stay out of sight for a while.
I will eventually assign you to a proper position.
I know about your potential more than anyone else.
I will make sure it is engraved within my mind.
Did he show up at the club already?
The goods should be brought there within the next few days.
Be careful not to interfere with the transaction.
We know it will all be in vain if we screw up the deal.
That aside, who is that kid?
There is no need to worry about him.
I do not want any distractions during the mission.
You provided me with shelter from the rain.
I could have called for a cab with that hundred grand.
I did not think about that.
Li-san, you are a strange person.
Let us meet up for a meal sometime.
I had trouble reaching you since you do not have a cell phone.
Sorry for the late notice, but we will not be able to work for three nights, starting today.
Remember the problems we were having with the bathroom?
You will be on paid leave while the construction's going on.
That is very kind of you.
A-Aniki, what did you just say?
I said I am going to divide the organization.
I am indebted to the boss, but he is become senile.
A gangster in need of stability is not much of a gangster.
Why are you telling me this?
I have a job for you.
It is a state-of-the-art doll that will do anything it is told to do.
There are rich people out there who want these kinds of toys.
Take care of her for the next two or three days.
If you do not feed her, she will die.
You will have to take care of her excretions, too.
Make sure you keep her clean.
Do not get caught up with dirty thoughts.
Why did you get him involved?
The merchandise might become tainted unless an idiot like him takes care of it.
He does not have the balls to betray me.
I thought I would have to kill someone since he said he had a job for me.
You do not understand Japanese, do you?
Do not look at me like that.
What are they going to do with you?
I already told you everything I know.
I am sure you have, but it still does not make sense for some reason.
The mysterious group that calls itself E.P.R., their statement,
Are they enemies or are they working independently?
What is his objective in the first place?
yet they are telling us to go after them.
Say, did Hoshimi-sama say anything else?
I was pulling all-nighters until a little while ago.
I do not want to talk about work while I am home.
Misaki, are not you off-duty tomorrow, too?
You are probably not doing anything, so why do not you come with me?
Are you sure you were not noticed?
It was probably stolen from them, I bet.
There is been internal conflict within the Nakazawa family recently.
What are you going to do?
It is best not to look into it too much.
Whether we continue the mission or not is not a decision we can make.
I am going to submit a request, so everything's on hold until then.
Can we use your place as a hideout?
The jewel in hand gives off a clear, uncolored glow,
its purity calling near the specter of devastation.
Their two worlds were never supposed to have crossed.
They have nowhere to go, and their flight will continue without end.
They did not even want to know what lies ahead of them.
And so, the boy lies down in the trash heap.
Episode Eighteen A Love Song Sung from a Trash Heap... (Part Two)
